text: Orlando Alexis Sinclair Hernández (born 19 April 1998) is a Costa Rican footballer who plays as a forward for New England Revolution II in USL League One on loan from Saprissa. == Career == Sinclair signed with Loudoun United FC on March 1, 2019. On January 16, 2020, Sinclair was announced as part of the inaugural roster for New England Revolution II of USL League One. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Costa Rican footballers Category:Costa Rican expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Deportivo Saprissa players Category:Loudoun United FC players Category:USL Championship players Category:New England Revolution II players Category:USL League One players
title: Orlando Sinclair
